content: what day is it today Tuesday as an example and how many of those day are in the year 2026

Good morning! According to my systems, today's date is Sunday, February 8th, 2026.

If you're wondering about Tuesdays specifically, there are 52 Tuesdays in a typical non-leap year like 2026. Leap years have 53 Tuesdays due to the extra day added to the calendar in February.
